user_query: Can you help me calculate the age of my colleagues? I have their birthdates in the format YYYY-MM-DD. I would like to know the age, year, month, and day for each person. Please use the US/Eastern timezone.

TaskList.description: Collect the list of birthdates from the user.
Convert the provided birthdates into the appropriate timezone (US/Eastern).
Calculate the age in years, months, and days for each birthdate.
Format the age results for each colleague to be presented back to the user.
